com.android.slackandhay.sound
Class SoundEffect

java.lang.Object
  com.android.slackandhay.sound.SoundEffect

public class SoundEffect
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a single sound that can be triggered by the sound engine. it also contains a method to randomize the pitch of the sound, so that it seems that there is a bigger variety of sounds

Author:
Tilman BÃ¶rner, Jan Rabe & Tom Wallroth
